lines.text:
[Dressed as Hitler]
Ach, ich ich ich ach, ach ze vompen ze hast haben! Ja? You fail to catch three spies! Blow out your brains!
But mein fuher, ve are nazis! Ve have no brains!
Zen vat you got, blow out!
Heil Hitler!
Hang Hitler! Ven my field marshall counts three, start blowing!
One!... What comes after one?
TWO! Never mind, fat boy, I count myself. One! Two! Th... t... t... ACHOO!

[Picks up mustache that Moe sneezed off]
Oh, mein fuher!
Oh, my personality, thanks buddy.

[the Stooges are leaning over the railing of the ship]
Hi, fellas! Oh, where'd you get the suntan?
Ooh, I'm seasick...
It's only mind over matter! That's all! Here, Moe, have some of my raw liver!
[Moe holds his mouth and runs away]
What's wrong with him? Hey Larry, share my raw liver, it's delicious!
[Larry runs away covering his mouth]
What's the matter with you guys? Ya can't take it!
[laughs, takes a bite of his raw liver. Suddenly realizes where he is, turns around and collapses, leaning over the railing of the ship]
Zat's treason! Zat's mutiny! I'll have you hung... I'll have you shot for zat! Heil Hitler!
Heil Hitler!
Heil Hitler!
Heil Hitler!
Heil Hitler!
Heil Hitler!
Heil nothing! Come on, you!

[hiding on the Nazi ship with Curly and Larry]
We gotta get into Nazi uniforms, somehow. If we're discovered, we're lost.
You're crazy. If we're discovered, we're found.
